// components/CustomToast.js
import React,{useEffect}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const CustomToast=_ref=>{let{message,type='success',onClose}=_ref;useEffect(()=>{const timer=setTimeout(()=>{onClose();},2500);return()=>clearTimeout(timer);},[onClose]);const bgColor=type==='error'?'#fca5a5':'#bbf7d0';const textColor=type==='error'?'#991b1b':'#065f46';return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{position:'fixed',bottom:'20px',right:'20px',backgroundColor:bgColor,color:textColor,padding:'12px 20px',borderRadius:'8px',boxShadow:'0 4px 12px rgba(0,0,0,0.1)',zIndex:9999,fontWeight:'500'},children:message});};export default CustomToast;
